item.title: APU Fire Detection System – Detection Loop – Both Inoperative

remarks.para: Both loops may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: APU is used for ground operations only, and is continuously monitored,
APU external control system is operative, and
APU is shut down before taxi.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: A fire guard must be positioned near the tail of the aircraft to continuously monitor the APU.

If fire is observed at the APU, the fire guard must proceed immediately to the APU FIRE CONTROL handle in the right main wheel well, pull the APU fire control handle, and push the APU EXTINGUISHER DISCHARGE switch.

note.para: Ensure APU is shut down prior to taxi and a fire guard is positioned at destination before starting APU.

numlitem.para: APU TO PACK TAKEOFF procedure is not permitted.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to FIRE/OVHT Test Switch: "APU FIRE LOOP A (and B) INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
